fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article on India’s exit from the Cricket World Cup said they won eight of their nine group matches. In fact they won seven, as their group match against New Zealand was abandoned (Kohli regrets ‘45 minutes of bad cricket’, 11 July, page 49). • A photograph used to illustrate an article headlined “Berlin to offer public transport for €1 a day in drive to cut car use” showed a tram in another German city, Karlsruhe (10 July, page 23). • Other recently corrected articles include: Sugar in fruit juice may raise risk of cancer, study finds Silicon Valley’s answer to the housing crises? Charging $1,200 for a bunk bed in a shared house
